title: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Break Time
overview: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Break Time (Re:ゼロから始める休憩時間(ブレイクタイム)) is a mini anime produced by Studio Puyukai. It is a series of animated shorts meant to complement the main anime.After episode 11 of the first season, the series was rebranded into Re:Petit kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu (Re:プチから始める異世界生活). It returned to its original branding for the entirety of Season 2.Season 1 was announced on April 7, 2016, Season 2 was announced on July 3, 2020, and Season 3 was announced on October 1, 2024.Each short had an exclusive premiere on the television network AT-X, scheduled after the corresponding main anime episode. Days after broadcast, the episodes would be released online for a limited time. Those pertaining to the first cour of Season 2 (episodes 26-38) are an exception to this, as they only premiered online.
